participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and nurturing, Emma enjoys exploring the world around her while maintaining close ties with her family.
participant_1.background: I have always been close to my family, even though we are not always in agreement. I try to walk with my cats every day, and I also do some yoga. I work at a grocery store. I always have a beer after work. My favorite subject in school was science.

participant_2.name: Luca
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, Luca is passionate about music and inspired by his family's immigrant background.
participant_2.background: I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests. My parents were immigrants from Italy. I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling. My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative every day. I work full time.

content.text: Hey, my favorite subject in school was science too! What did you like about it?
I loved learning about the natural world, and how things work. What did you like about it?
I liked learning about how the world works too, and I always enjoyed doing experiments.
Same here! I also liked learning about different animals and plants.
Me too! I also liked learning about different cultures and languages.
That's awesome! What do you do for work now?
I work at a grocery store. What about you?
I work full time, and I also run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.
That's awesome! I try to walk with my cats every day, and I also do some yoga.
Sounds like we both have active lifestyles! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out with friends, watch movies, and read. What about you?

I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests. My parents were immigrants from Italy, and my family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
